data.message: Will it help me? I'm not in a remote place... But not getting a great signal. Is this internet purchased through FB?

replies.message: Hi Karen. Aquila is our very first solar powered airplane that was designed to bring connectivity to the people who currently do not have it. This is a huge technology challenge, and that's where we're focused right now. If you'd like to learn more about Aquila, please visit: http://bit.ly/2a2wTKi. -Jessica
Like for me!! Where we have WiFi access only in our court house, but none where we reside!! Yay thank you Facebook for being thoughtful of us!! I never knew anyone actually cared!!
